name: Stratagem
description:
STRATAGEM is a sci-fi arcade experience where you must save your crew members from certain destruction. Navigate the challenges of tracking ricochets and orbits.

  • Launch escape pods without sending active ones into colliding orbits.
  • Fill the screen with as many pods as possible without letting them collide
  • Play on three different arenas in 4 different modes.
  • Challenge your friends with local co-op multiplayer mode (coop or versus)
  • Try to get a highscore in Endless or Timed modes
